name: Ming Dynasty: From Xu Familys Scorn to Ascension Through Battle!
author: 无量功德
content: Zhu Xiong was reborn in a small town within Beiping territory during the early years of the Ming Dynasty.In this significant year, Zhu Yuanzhang, the founding emperor, was in his prime.With Crown Prince Zhu Biao by his side, he rectified the laws and discipline of the imperial court, and consolidated the territories.During the same period, Zhu Xiong has been living for two years with the woman he saved, Xu Jin’er.
